settings.button_label_1: SAVE $400 & BOOK NOW WITH 3 FREE MONTHS OF ULTRABURN

settings.heading: REDEFINING YOUR MUSCLES TO LOOK & FEEL YOUR BEST
settings.title: truSculpt® Flex Muscle Toning
settings.body: Balanced Aesthetics Medspa is pleased to bring our clients truSculpt® flex, a muscle-sculpting system to build strength for your fitness level, shape, and goals. Strengthen, firm, and tone your muscles with truSculpt® flex’s comfortable, safe, and effective technology, which increases muscle mass by an average of 30%, as shown in clinical studies.

settings.text: If you would like to increase your strength, improve your muscle mass by up to 30%, and improve stamina for your muscles, you may be a good candidate for truSculpt® flex treatments. Your Balanced Aesthetics specialist will discuss your health, medical history, and goals to create a treatment plan tailored to your needs during your comprehensive consultation.

You will have visible, measurable improvement to the strength and mass of your treated muscles following a series of treatments, and those improvements will continue to accumulate for 8-12 weeks. The best part is, with your increased muscle mass, you will get more out of your workouts to help you maintain your newfound strength. For some, monthly maintenance treatments will also help prolong results.

If you’re tired of working out and not getting the muscle definition you want, or you’ve hit a plateau with your exercise routine, truSculpt® flex may be just the jumpstart you need to reach the next level. With your newly sculpted muscles, you can enjoy the physique you’ve always wanted, thanks to truSculpt® flex.

settings.question: How Dos truSculpt® Flex Work?
settings.answer: truSculpt® flex uses Multi-Directional Stimulation (MDS) technology to monopolar radiofrequency (RF) energy to stimulate deep, high-impact muscle contractions that replicate intensified crunch, squat and twisting actions. You can treat up to 8 areas in each 45-minute session for a personalized level of muscle stimulation that can’t be reproduced by even the most vigorous workout. With the flexibility to tailor the treatment for your personal fitness level, body type, and goals, truSculpt® flex is designed to achieve optimal muscle toning through MDS.

settings.question: What are truSculpt® Flex Treatments Like?
settings.answer: truSculpt® flex treatments are about as long as the average workout, lasting around 45 minutes and treating up to 8 areas in one session. It usually takes 4-8 treatments depending on your goals. You’ll feel a contracting sensation deep in your muscles, and the intensity will slowly increase throughout your session. Afterward, you’re free to return to your routine.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: Because there are no needles, medications, or scalpels involved, there is no downtime. You may experience tingling and muscle soreness—much like you would after an intense workout—for up to 72 hours following your truSculpt® flex session.
